name: FISA Beta
description:
FISA is a 2D physics-based multiplayer sports game in which players compete against each other in intense soccer matches and space combat. The ultimate goal: become the reigning intergalactic Spaceball champions.

This game is in active development, and we will continue to update it as we iterate on the game. Currently, Gamepads are required to play the game. Xbox 360 and Xbox One controllers are tested and fully working. The game is almost finished and would appreciate any feedback you have. Just leave it in the comments!

We are also trying to raise $100 in order to submit the game to Steam Greenlight, so you can donate if you wish by clicking the "Support This Game" button above!

Coming Soon:

  • Free-For-All Mode (1v1v1)
  • 3 More Levels
